test_message: Why is attendance dropping in Sem 3?

hypotheses: Recent faculty turnover may be affecting student engagement in Semester 3.
Increased perceived difficulty of assessments is leading to decreased attendance.
Possible lack of motivation post-midterm is causing lower attendance rates.

what_if_scenarios.scenario: If faculty stability improves in Semester 3

anomalies.description: Steep drop in attendance after midterm exams in March

recommendations: Assess and support new faculty for Semester 3 courses.
Review assessment difficulty and consider moderation.
Engage students with feedback to understand specific attendance barriers.
Monitor attendance weekly for early warning of further declines.
